text:
You think AI can't replace doctors.

But you haven't seen this scared doctor:

☑ He uploads an X-ray from a patient.
☑ The AI predicts correctly the disease in 1 second.

The doctor has 20 years of experience.

And AI is (arguably) 3 years old since its boom.

↳ Now, imagine AI in 3 more years. Or 20 years.

☑ You must master it today, before it masters you.
